description:
SALE!!! $0.99 FOR A LIMITED TIME!!!
 ***** Bored? Not sure what to do tonight? Fire up "iBored" and let it tell you what's going on in your area! Search for "music", "festival", "art show" or anything else and "iBored" will show you what's going on, give you a map and let you add the event to your calendar. "iBored" helps you get get off your couch and have some fun!
Now with the ability to search by category, just double tap the text field for ideas! (thanks for the feedback everybody!).

******* SUPPORT *******
If you have problems or questions, please email ibored@ncavesoft.com rather than using the App Catalog. Or better yet, visit www.ncavesoft.com to get updates on iBored news and see our other WebOS software.
